ygData.subject: quest in kelethin
ygData.msgSnippet: hey i am in kelethin and i went over to the emerald warriors guild, actually just wandered, and i talked to an npc outside of the em war. guild he says
ygData.messageBody:
hey<br>i am in kelethin and i went over to the
emerald warriors guild, actually just wandered, and i
talked to an npc outside of the em war. guild he says
something about the cycle of life and how young warriors
hunt and collect food for the rest and then he says
something about shark meat. i asked him if i could get him
some shark meat and he gave me a bag to place shark
meat in and then combine it...he says if i do it i
will get a piercing weapon. does anyone know what
weapon it is? is it worth doing it? also, where could i
get shark meat??<br><br>thanks<br>Talrasha<br>Wizard
of the Veeshan
